tpk::OpticsVt

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Tip/tilt optics virtual telescope.

An OpticsVt object generates an tip/tilt demand for steerable optics from a target and wavelength and the roll and pitch of the mount. It can be used, for example, to generate chop throws for a chopping M2 or M1 tip and tilt for a telescope with more than one optical telescope assembly attached to a single mount.

All the methods of this class are thread safe.
